sentences.english: In inner silence, we experience who we really are.
sentences.chinese: 内心静默时，我们正体验着我们真正是谁。
没有冷却风扇，静默工作。

sentences.english: Guo. The old brick house stood there as quiet as ever.
sentences.chinese: 老砖木房子如同以前一般静默。

sentences.english: Silent mode support for invoking multiple operations.
sentences.chinese: 静默模式支持调用多个操作。

sentences.english: No statue can be more stilled than this.
sentences.chinese: 没有一个雕像能比这更静默。

sentences.english: You are waiting with anxious eyes at my door, sleepless and silent.
sentences.chinese: 你带着切望的眼睛，在门前等我，无眠而静默。

sentences.english: That night, you do not know, I have been silently in your heart.
sentences.chinese: 那夜，你并不知道，我一直静默在你的心情中。

sentences.english: Because rock keeps silence which makes instigator don't know what to do with it.
sentences.chinese: 因为石头的静默令挑衅生事者无从入手。

sentences.english: That night, I silently in your heart.
sentences.chinese: 那夜，我静默在你的心情中。

sentences.english: Solitary, smelling the earthy smell, stopping now and then in the silence.
sentences.chinese: 独自地，嗅闻著泥土的气息，不时地，于静默中伫立。

sentences.english: God's silence ripens man's thoughts ito speech.
sentences.chinese: 上帝的静默使人的思想成熟为语言。

sentences.english: Run the silent update on ha1 using the command shown below.
sentences.chinese: 使用如下所示的命令运行静默更新。

sentences.english: The silent mode of installation uses response files to install silently.
sentences.chinese: 静默安装模式使用响应文件安装，不需要交互。

sentences.english: Oh, Mrs. Dalloway, always giving parties to cover the silence.
sentences.chinese: 哦，达洛威夫人，总是举办聚会来掩盖静默。

sentences.english: Therefore the prudent shall keep silence in that time;
sentences.chinese: 所以通达人见这样的时势，必静默不言。

sentences.english: No matter it is fully blooming or silently declining, willingness and respect we keep to it are always there.
sentences.chinese: 不管是竭力盛放，还是静默颓败，都如此甘愿和珍重。

definition: to remain silent/to have nothing to say
to gaze at/to stare fixedly at
to gaze at/to fix one's eyes on
to not say a word (idiom)/to keep silent
to stand for a long time
